title: Rocky Crest Golf Resort One of Top Summer Getaways in Muskoka
text:
July 31, 2015 16:19 ET Rocky Crest Golf Resort One of Top Summer Getaways in Muskoka 
ClubLink's Rocky Crest Golf Resort, Muskoka's only all-suite resort, has been picked by Muskoka Tourism as one of six top summer getaways in Muskoka, Ontario, a vacation destination that has been recognized by National Geographic several years in a row. 
MUSKOKA, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - July 31, 2015) - Rocky Crest Golf Resort ( www.rockycrest.ca ), Muskoka's only all-suite resort, has been selected by Muskoka Tourism as one of the top six Muskoka summer getaways. Located on scenic Lake Joseph in the heart of Muskoka, Rocky Crest is a member of the ClubLink family of prestigious golf clubs and resorts. The popular full-service Ontario resort features an on-site championship golf course, spa, and three restaurants. Rocky Crest's selection as one of the top six summer getaways in Muskoka comes on the heels of recent accolades of the region by National Geographic Traveler magazine as a world-class vacation destination. Muskoka was chosen by National Geographic as one of the top 20 'Best of the World Must-see' places to visit. The magazine also picked Muskoka for the number one spot on its list of the 'Ten Best Trips of the Summer'. Most recently, National Geographic included Muskoka in the book '100 Places That Can Change Your Child's Life'. 
The Muskoka Tourism article naming the top six Muskoka summer getaways includes a selection of the best Muskoka resort packages for summer. Rocky Crest Golf Resort's featured summer package, the Muskoka Cottage Special, offers vacationers all the fun of being at a cottage, but with a full waterfront, sports club, three restaurants, and golf on site. The Rocky Crest 2015 Muskoka Cottage Special includes suite accommodations at a discounted rate and a 45-minute boat cruise on Lake Joseph. The package also features a daily $100, which can be used for golf, spa services, or at one of Rocky Crest's three restaurants. Subject to availability, the special summer package is valid through September 6, 2015. A minimum stay of five consecutive nights is required to take advantage of this attractively priced package. 
Although Muskoka is just two hours north of Toronto, it seems like a world away. For generations, vacationers have flocked to this fabled piece of Ontario cottage country to "unplug", relax and enjoy its many beautiful lakes, charming towns and villages, fresh air and natural beauty. Over 2.1 million visitors come to Muskoka each year. It is considered quintessential cottage country. There are plenty of exciting things to do in Muskoka. With hundreds of terrific area attractions and many popular events, Muskoka offers something for everyone. 
"What makes Muskoka such a special place to so many, are those iconic cottage country activities and longstanding traditions that everyone loves to enjoy when vacationing at the lake. Things like relaxing on the beach with friends, barbequing a freshly caught fish, cannonballs off the dock, roasting marshmallows by the campfire, exploring a woodland trail, star-gazing at night, or simply sitting back and enjoying the nature beauty of the area," states Jerry Feltis, General Manager of Rocky Crest Resort. "At Rocky Crest, we know why people love Muskoka. That is why the vacation experience that we provide for our guests combines the best aspects of a Muskoka cottage vacation, with the extra amenities that only a full-service resort can provide," adds Feltis. 
About Rocky Crest Golf Resort: One of Ontario's top lakefront resorts, Rocky Crest Golf Resort is a traditional full-service, all-suites Ontario resort and a favorite Muskoka vacation destination for families, couples and group events. Located on beautiful Lake Joseph in the heart of Muskoka, Rocky Crest Golf Resort offers tastefully furnished waterfront suites, spacious villas and family-friendly cottages and cabins. Rocky Crest features casual and fine-dining options, wedding, conference and meeting facilities, a full-service onsite spa, extensive recreational facilities and an award-winning ClubLink affiliated on-site golf course. For information about Rocky Crest Golf Resort or to book a Muskoka family vacation, romantic getaway or golf weekend, visit ( http://www.rockycrest.ca ) or call 866-323-3305. Contact Information
